Html:
Hello,

Just want to know if i can hide a worksheet with the last version of PHPExcel?

thx

Not supported in PHPExcel 1.7.0, but sounds like a good idea for enhancement. Let's see whether Maarten says it is possible or not. Copying to a feature request:

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=10745
